column3: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ituw woho wɔ ewurkadze mu? Nyankopɔn adom wɔ hɔ daa nyina."

column2: "Wo tɛkyerɛma hyehyɛ ndzebɔnyɛ; Dɛ oyindam a n'ano ndam ndam
"Ɔwo edɔ bɔn sen papa; Na ator sen dɛ ebɛka dza ɔtsen."
"Nyankopɔn so bodwuruw wo egu famu koraa
column4: na oetu wo efi w'asesee mu. Na oetutu w'ase efi atseasefo asaase do."

column8: nyimpa a ɔammfa Nyankopɔn annyɛ n'akoban; Na ɔdze no werɛ tweer n'ahonya no dodow
column9: Na ɔhyɛɛ noho dzen wɔ ne ndzebɔnyɛ mu no nye yi."

column3: metse dɛ ngodua prɔmprɔm wɔ Nyankopɔn fie: Medan Nyankopɔn n'adom daa daa nyina."
osiandɛ ɔwoara na ayɛ: Na matweɔn wo dzin
